text: The Super Globe is a handball competition contested between the champion clubs from continental confederations. The first Women's Super Globe will be played in China. ==Summary== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width: 98%; text-align: center;" |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF !rowspan=2 width=5%|Year !rowspan=2 width=8%|Host !width=1% rowspan=4 bgcolor=ffffff| !colspan=3|Final !width=1% rowspan=4 bgcolor=ffffff| !colspan=3|Third place match |- !width=15%|Champion !width=7%|Score !width=15%|Second place !width=15%|Third place !width=7%|Score !width=15%|Fourth place |- |2016 | |colspan=3|Cancelled |colspan=3|Cancelled |- |2019 Details | Wuxi | 1º de Agosto |27–22 | China National Club | UnC Concórdia |35–32 | Omron Yamaga |} ==Records and statistics== ===By club=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Rank !Club !Won !Runner-up !Third !Years won |- | 1 |align=left| 1º de Agosto | 1 | 0 | 0 |align=left|2019 |- | 2 |align=left| China National Club | 0 | 1 | 0 |align=left| |- | 3 |align=left| UnC Concórdia | 0 | 0 | 1 |align=left| |} ===By country=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Rank !Nation !Won !Runner-up !Third !Total |- | 1 |align=left| | 1 | 0 | 0 | 1 |- | 2 |align=left| | 0 | 1 | 0 | 1 |- | 3 |align=left| | 0 | 0 | 1 | 1 |} ==Participation details== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:90%" |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF !Team!!2019 (8)!!Total |- |align=left| 1º de Agosto ||bgcolor=gold|1st||1 |- |align=left| University of Queensland ||7th||1 |- |align=left| UnC Concórdia ||bgcolor=#CC9966|3rd||1 |- |align=left| China National Club ||bgcolor=silver|2nd||1 |- |align=left| Jiangsu Handball ||6th||1 |- |align=left| Omron Yamaga ||4th||1 |- |align=left| Kaysar Club ||5th||1 |- |align=left| New York City THC ||8th||1 |} ==References== Category:International handball competitions Category:Sports club competitions Super Globe
